pxchat.net.protocol.core
Class ServerFrameAdapter

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.net.protocol.core.ServerFrameAdapter

public class ServerFrameAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the interface between a server socket and the frame protocol. It handles incoming and outgoing data by calling the process event of the associated listener.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

Constructor Detail

ServerFrameAdapter

public ServerFrameAdapter(ServerFrameAdapterListener serverListener,
                          FrameAdapterListener adapterListener)
Constructs a new server frame adapter with the specified listeners for the adapter itself and the child frame adapters.

Parameters:
serverListener - The server listener
adapterListener - The frame adapter listener
Method Detail

broadcast

public int broadcast(FrameQueue queue,
                     boolean immediate,
                     int... exceptSessionID)
Broadcasts data to all frame adapters registered with this server adapter and returns the number of clients reached. If immediate is set, this method calls the FrameAdapter.send() method. It is possible to pass a list of exceptions to the broadcast.

Parameters:
queue - The data to enqueue in the outgoing buffer of the frame adapters
immediate - If true, the data is send immediately
exceptSessionID - A list of session ids the queue should not be sent to
Returns:
The number of clients reached by the broadcast

broadcastTo

public int broadcastTo(FrameQueue queue,
                       boolean immediate,
                       int... toSessionID)
Broadcasts data to all frame adapters specified in the toSessionID array and returns the number of clients reached. If immediate is set, this method calls the FrameAdapter.send() method.

Parameters:
queue - The data to enqueue in the outgoing buffer of the frame adapters
immediate - If true, the data is send immediately
toSessionID - A list of session ids to send data to
Returns:
The number of clients reached by the broadcast

broadcastToAuth

public int broadcastToAuth(FrameQueue queue,
                           boolean immediate)
Broadcasts data to all authenticated adapters of this server adapter.

Parameters:
queue - The data to enqueue in the outgoing buffer of the frame adapters
immediate - If true, the data is send immediately
Returns:
The number of clients reached by the broadcast

delete

public void delete(AuthFrameAdapter adapter)
Removes the specified frame adapter from the server adapter.

Parameters:
adapter - The frame adapter to remove

delete

public void delete(int index)
Removes the frame adapter with the specified index from the server adapter.

Parameters:
index - The index of the frame adapter

getAdapter

public AuthFrameAdapter getAdapter(CustomSocket socket)
Returns the adapter associated with the specified socket. If there is no adapter registered for the socket, a new one is created.

Parameters:
socket - The socket to return the adapter for
Returns:
The frame adapter associated with the socket

getAdapter

public AuthFrameAdapter getAdapter(int sessionID)
Returns the adapter associated with the specified session id.

Parameters:
sessionID - The session id to return the adapter for
Returns:
The frame adapter associated with the socket

getAdapters

public java.util.Vector<AuthFrameAdapter> getAdapters()
Returns the adapters connected to this server frame adapter.

Returns:
The adapters

getNewSessionID

protected int getNewSessionID()
Creates and returns a new unique session id. This method is thread-safe.

Returns:
A new session id

indexOfSessionID

public int indexOfSessionID(int sessionID)
Returns the index of the frame adapter with the specified session id.

Parameters:
sessionID - The session id of the adapter
Returns:
The index of the adapter

indexOfSocket

public int indexOfSocket(CustomSocket socket)
Returns the index of the frame adapter associated with the specified socket. If there is no adapter registered for the socket, a new one is created.

Parameters:
socket - The socket to search the index for
Returns:
The index of the socket
